briefTitle: Single Dose Pharmacokinetic Study of GB221 in Comparison With Herceptin ®
officialTitle: A Single Center, Randomized, Blind, Parallel Controlled, Single Dose Pharmacokinetic Study of Recombinant Humanized Anti-HER-2 Monoclonal Antibody Injection GB221 in Comparison With Herceptin ® in Chinese Healthy Adult Volunteers
